trans-unit.source: Conditionally runs one of two or more activities of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> 형식의 둘 이상의 활동 중 하나를 조건에 따라 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
This activity provides semantics similar to two `If-ElseIf` statements.
trans-unit.target: 이 활동은 두 개의 `If-ElseIf` 문과 비슷한 의미 체계를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> contains an ordered set of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> classes and runs the first branch when the condition evaluates to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>는 정렬된 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> 클래스 집합을 포함하며 조건이 `true`이면 첫 번째 분기를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The final branch is not required to have a condition, in which case it always evaluates to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 마지막 분기에는 조건이 없어도 되며, 이 경우 조건이 항상 `true`입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> can complete without having run any child activity, if no conditions are satisfied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>는 조건을 만족하지 않는 경우 자식 활동을 실행하지 않아도 완료할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> class and add two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> classes to it.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만들고 두 개의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> 클래스를 해당 인스턴스에 추가하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SequentialWorkflowWithParameters SDK Sample from the SequentialWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 SequentialWorkflow.cs 파일에 있는 SequentialWorkflowWithParameters SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Sequential Workflow With Parameters](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17157f2d-8fed-4848-a386-e4efa381b66b).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" /> class.

The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> class and add two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> classes to it.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만들고 두 개의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> 클래스를 해당 인스턴스에 추가하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SequentialWorkflowWithParameters SDK sample from the SequentialWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 SequentialWorkflow.cs 파일에 있는 SequentialWorkflowWithParameters SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Sequential Workflow With Parameters](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17157f2d-8fed-4848-a386-e4efa381b66b).
The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new branch to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" />.
A collection of activities to add to the new branch.
Adds a new branch to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" /> using a collection of new activities to add to the new branch.
trans-unit.target: 새 분기에 추가할 새 활동의 컬렉션을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" />에 새 분기를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The updated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> with the new branches.
A collection of activities to add to the new branch.
An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that determines whether the branch should be run.
Adds a new branch to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" /> using a collection of new activities to add to the new branch.
trans-unit.target: 새 분기에 추가할 새 활동의 컬렉션을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" />에 새 분기를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The updated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> with the new branches.
The object that raised the event.
The previously typed event arguments.
Defines the processing procedure when a change the activity execution status occurs.
trans-unit.target: 활동 실행 상태가 변경될 때의 처리 절차를 정의합니다.
